title: Staff of Arcane Blessing
content:
ring or can be asked to place the ring on a nearby table with the appropriate dialogue options. Equipping the ring reveals an additional elevator button letting you ascend from the top of the tower. The elevator starts up once you've put a sussur flower into the generator. (X: 166 Y: -431)
